00048 void EGS_RandomGenerator::allocate(int n) {
00049     if( n < 1 ) egsFatal("Attempt to construct a RNG with n < 1\n");
00050     rarray = new EGS_Float[n]; np = n; ip = np;
00051 }
00052 
00053 void EGS_RandomGenerator::copyBaseState(const EGS_RandomGenerator &r) {
00054     if( np > 0 && np != r.np ) {
00055         delete [] rarray; np = 0;
00056     }
00057     if( np <= 0 ) allocate(r.np);
00058     ip = r.ip; have_x = r.have_x; the_x = r.the_x; count = r.count;
00059     for(int j=ip; j<np; j++) rarray[j] = r.rarray[j];
00060 }
00061 
00062 EGS_RandomGenerator::EGS_RandomGenerator(int n) : count(0), np(0) {
00063     allocate(n);
00064     have_x = false;
00065     for(int j=0; j<np; j++) rarray[j] = 0;
00066 }
00067 
00068 bool EGS_RandomGenerator::storeState(ostream &data) {
00069     if( !egsStoreI64(data,count) ) return false;
00070     data << " " << np << "  " << ip << endl;
00071     for(int j=0; j<np; j++) data << rarray[j] << " ";
00072     data << endl;
00073     if( !data.good() ) return false;
00074     return storePrivateState(data);
00075 }
00076 
00077 bool EGS_RandomGenerator::setState(istream &data) {
00078     if( !egsGetI64(data,count) ) return false;
00079     int np1;
00080     data >> np1 >> ip;
00081     if( !data.good() || data.fail() || data.eof() ) return false;
00082     if( np1 < 1 ) return false;
00083     if( np1 != np && np > 0 ) {
00084         delete [] rarray; rarray = new EGS_Float [np1];
00085     }
00086     np = np1;
00087     for(int j=0; j<np; j++) data >> rarray[j];
00088     if( !data.good() ) return false;
00089     return setPrivateState(data);
00090 }
00091 
00092 bool EGS_RandomGenerator::addState(istream &data) {
00093     EGS_I64 count_save = count;
00094     if( !setState(data) ) return false;
00095     count += count_save;
00096     return true;
00097 }

00104 class EGS_LOCAL EGS_Ranmar : public EGS_RandomGenerator {
00105 
00106 public:
00107 
00111     EGS_Ranmar(int ixx=1802, int jxx=9373, int n=128) :
00112         EGS_RandomGenerator(n), copy(0), high_res(false) { setState(ixx,jxx); };
00113 
00114     EGS_Ranmar(const EGS_Ranmar &r) : EGS_RandomGenerator(r),
00115         ix(r.ix), jx(r.jx), c(r.c), iseed1(r.iseed1), iseed2(r.iseed2),
00116         high_res(r.high_res) {
00117         for(int j=0; j<97; j++) u[j] = r.u[j];
00118     };
00119 
00120     ~EGS_Ranmar() {
00121         if( copy ) delete copy;
00122     };
00123 
00126     void fillArray(int n, EGS_Float *array);
00127 
00129     void describeRNG() const;
00130 
00131     EGS_RandomGenerator* getCopy();
00132 
00133     void setState(EGS_RandomGenerator *r);
00134 
00135     void saveState();
00136     void resetState();
00137 
00138     int  rngSize() const { return baseSize() + 102*sizeof(int); };
00139 
00140     void setHighResolution(bool hr) { high_res = hr; };
00141 
00142 protected:
00143 
00147     bool storePrivateState(ostream &data);
00149     bool setPrivateState(istream &data);
00150 
00151     void set(const EGS_Ranmar &r) {
00152         copyBaseState(r);
00153         ix = r.ix; jx = r.jx; c = r.c;
00154         iseed1 = r.iseed1; iseed2 = r.iseed2;
00155         for(int j=0; j<97; j++) u[j] = r.u[j];
00156     };
00157 
00158 private:
00159 
00160     void setState(int ixx, int jxx);
00161 
00162     int        ix, jx, c;
00163     int        u[97];
00164     static     int cd, cm;
00165     static EGS_Float  twom24;
00166     int        iseed1, iseed2;
00167 
00168     bool       high_res;
00169 
00170     EGS_Ranmar *copy;
00171 
00172 };
00173 
00174 void EGS_Ranmar::saveState() {
00175     if( copy ) copy->set(*this);
00176     else copy = new EGS_Ranmar(*this);
00177     copy->copy = 0;
00178 }
00179 
00180 void EGS_Ranmar::resetState() {
00181     if( copy ) {
00182         EGS_Ranmar *tmp = copy;
00183         set(*copy); copy = tmp;
00184     }
00185 }
00186 
00187 EGS_RandomGenerator* EGS_Ranmar::getCopy() {
00188     EGS_Ranmar *c = new EGS_Ranmar(*this);
00189     c->np = 0; c->copy = 0; c->copyBaseState(*this);
00190     return c;
00191 }
00192 
00193 void EGS_Ranmar::setState(EGS_RandomGenerator *r) {
00194     copyBaseState(*r);
00195     EGS_Ranmar *r1 = dynamic_cast<EGS_Ranmar *>(r);
00196     if( !r1 ) egsFatal("EGS_Ranmar::setState: attampt to set my state by a non EGS_Ranmar RNG!\n");
00197     ix = r1->ix; jx = r1->jx; c = r1->c;
00198     iseed1 = r1->iseed1; iseed2 = r1->iseed2;
00199     for(int j=0; j<97; j++) u[j] = r1->u[j];
00200 }
00201 
00202 bool EGS_Ranmar::storePrivateState(ostream &data) {
00203     data << ix << " " << jx << " " << c << " "
00204          << iseed1 << " " << iseed2 << " " << high_res << endl;
00205     for(int j=0; j<97; j++) data << u[j] << " ";
00206     data <<  endl;
00207     return data.good();
00208 }
00209 
00210 bool EGS_Ranmar::setPrivateState(istream &data) {
00211     data >> ix >> jx >> c >> iseed1 >> iseed2 >> high_res;
00212     for(int j=0; j<97; j++) data >> u[j];
00213     return data.good();
00214 }

00216 
00217 EGS_Float EGS_Ranmar::twom24 = 1./16777216.;
00218 int EGS_Ranmar::cd = 7654321;
00219 int EGS_Ranmar::cm = 16777213;
00220 
00221 void EGS_Ranmar::describeRNG() const {
00222     egsInformation("Random number generator:\n"
00223                    "============================================\n");
00224     egsInformation("  type                = ranmar\n");
00225     egsInformation("  high resolution     = ");
00226     if( high_res ) egsInformation("yes\n"); else egsInformation("no\n");
00227     egsInformation("  initial seeds       = %d %d\n",iseed1,iseed2);
00228     egsInformation("  numbers used so far = %lld\n",count);
00229 }
00230 
00231 void EGS_Ranmar::setState(int ixx, int jxx) {
00232     if( ixx <= 0 || ixx >= 31328) ixx = 1802;
00233     if( jxx <= 0 || jxx >= 30081) jxx = 9373;
00234     iseed1 = ixx; iseed2 = jxx;
00235     int i = (ixx/177)%177 + 2;
00236     int j = ixx%177 + 2;
00237     int k = (jxx/169)%178 + 1;
00238     int l = jxx%169;
00239 
00240     for(int ii=0; ii<97; ii++) {
00241         int s = 0; int t = 8388608;
00242         for(int jj=0; jj<24; jj++) {
00243             int m = (((i*j)%179)*k)%179;
00244             i = j; j = k; k = m;
00245             l = (53*l+1)%169;
00246             if( (l*m)%64 >= 32 ) s += t;
00247             t /= 2;
00248         }
00249         u[ii] = s;
00250     }
00251     c = 362436; ix = 96; jx = 32;
00252 }
00253 
00254 void EGS_Ranmar::fillArray(int n, EGS_Float *array) {
00255     for(int ii=0; ii<n; ii++) {
00256         register int r = u[ix] - u[jx--];
00257 #ifdef MSVC
00258         if( r > 16777219 ) egsWarning("r = %d\n",r);
00259 #endif
00260         if( r < 0 ) r += 16777216;
00261         u[ix--] = r;
00262         if(ix < 0) ix = 96;
00263         if(jx < 0) jx = 96;
00264         c -= cd; if( c < 0 ) c+=cm;
00265         r -= c; if( r < 0 ) r+=16777216;
00266 #ifdef MSVC
00267         if( r > 16777219 ) egsWarning("r = %d\n",r);
00268 #endif
00269         array[ii] = twom24*r;
00270     }
00271     if( high_res ) {
00272         for(int ii=0; ii<n; ii++) {
00273             register int r = u[ix] - u[jx--];
00274 #ifdef MSVC
00275             if( r > 16777219 ) egsWarning("r = %d\n",r);
00276 #endif
00277             if( r < 0 ) r += 16777216;
00278             u[ix--] = r;
00279             if(ix < 0) ix = 96;
00280             if(jx < 0) jx = 96;
00281             c -= cd; if( c < 0 ) c+=cm;
00282             r -= c; if( r < 0 ) r+=16777216;
00283 #ifdef MSVC
00284             if( r > 16777219 ) egsWarning("r = %d\n",r);
00285 #endif
00286             array[ii] += twom24*twom24*r;
00287         }
00288     }
00289     count += n;
00290 }

00292 
00293 EGS_RandomGenerator* EGS_RandomGenerator::createRNG(EGS_Input *input,
00294         int sequence) {
00295     if( !input ) {
00296         egsWarning("EGS_RandomGenerator::createRNG: null input?\n");
00297         return 0;
00298     }
00299     EGS_Input *i; bool delete_it = false;
00300     if( input->isA("rng definition") ) i = input;
00301     else {
00302         i = input->takeInputItem("rng definition");
00303         if( !i ) {
00304             egsWarning("EGS_RandomGenerator::createRNG: no 'RNG definition'"
00305                     " input\n");
00306             return 0;
00307         }
00308         delete_it = true;
00309     }
00310     string type;
00311     int err = i->getInput("type",type);
00312     if( err ) {
00313         egsWarning("EGS_RandomGenerator::createRNG: no RNG type specified\n"
00314                 "  Assuming ranmar.\n");
00315         type = "ranmar";
00316     }
00317     EGS_RandomGenerator *result;
00318     if( i->compare(type,"ranmar") ) {
00319         vector<int> seeds;
00320         err = i->getInput("initial seeds",seeds);
00321         EGS_Ranmar *res;
00322         if( !err && seeds.size() == 2 )
00323             res = new EGS_Ranmar(seeds[0],seeds[1] + sequence);
00324         else res = new EGS_Ranmar(1802,9373+sequence);
00325         vector<string> hr_options;
00326         hr_options.push_back("no"); hr_options.push_back("yes");
00327         bool hr = i->getInput("high resolution",hr_options,0);
00328         res->setHighResolution(hr);
00329         result = res;
00330     }
00331     else {
00332         egsWarning("EGS_RandomGenerator::createRNG: unknown RNG type %s\n",
00333                 type.c_str());
00334         result = 0;
00335     }
00336     if( delete_it ) delete i;
00337     return result;
00338 }
00339 
00340 EGS_RandomGenerator* EGS_RandomGenerator::defaultRNG(int sequence) {
00341     sequence += 97;
00342     int ixx = 33; int iaux = sequence/30081;
00343     int jxx = sequence - iaux*30081;
00344     if( iaux > 0 ) {
00345         ixx += iaux;
00346         if( iaux > 31328 ) egsFatal("EGS_RandomGenerator::defaultRNG: "
00347                 "sequence %d is outside of allowed range\n",sequence);
00348     }
00349     return new EGS_Ranmar(ixx,jxx);
00350 }
